We transform businesses with innovative Odoo solutions and cutting-edge web development
hero.description: Since 2015, we've been helping companies grow through expert Odoo implementations, seamless integrations, and modern web experiences.

story.subtitle: From a small team with big dreams to your trusted technology partner

milestone1.title: The Beginning
milestone1.description: Founded by a passionate team of Italian developers with a vision to make Odoo accessible to businesses of all sizes.

milestone2.title: Odoo Gold Partner
milestone2.description: Achieved Odoo Gold Partner status, recognizing our expertise and commitment to excellence in Odoo implementation.

milestone3.title: Team Expansion
milestone3.description: Grew our team to 10+ specialized professionals, expanding services to include 3CX integration and web development.

milestone4.title: Innovation Leader
milestone4.description: Reached 50+ successful projects and 1000+ downloads of our 3CX module, becoming a trusted name in the industry.

benefits.subtitle: Transform your business communication with SuperChat + Odoo

process.subtitle: From setup to go-live in 5 simple steps

step1.title: SuperChat Setup
step1.description: We configure your SuperChat account and connect all desired channels (WhatsApp, Instagram, etc.)

step2.title: API Integration
step2.description: We connect SuperChat to Odoo via API/Zapier for bidirectional synchronization

step3.title: Chatbot Configuration
step3.description: We set up AI automations, templates and automated responses for your business

step4.title: Team Training
step4.description: Complete training for your team on using SuperChat integrated with Odoo

step5.title: Go Live & Monitoring
step5.description: Launch and continuous monitoring with optimization and dedicated support
